verbose_text: HA-RanBPM wild-type (WT) or deletion mutants lacking either the N-terminus (DeltaN2), the C-terminus (DeltaC4), the SPRY domain (Delta212) or the LisH / CTLH domain (Delta360) (XREF_FIG) were transiently expressed in Hela RanBPM shRNA cells, and assessed for their ability to form aggresomes in response to MG132 treatment.
evidence: HA-RanBPM wild-type (WT) or deletion mutants lacking either the N-terminus (DeltaN2), the C-terminus (DeltaC4), the SPRY domain (Delta212) or the LisH/CTLH domain (Delta360) ( XREF_FIG ) were transiently expressed
